trialText: 14 day free trial. No credit card required.

integrations.title: Native Integrations
integrations.subtitle: Painless setup, seamless data transfer, and enhanced functionality with the rest of your stack.

developers.title: Built for Developers
developers.subtitle: Built on top of a extensible data model, Gather is easy to integrate and easy to extend.

codeSamples.title: Gather.js
API
codeSamples.code:
curl https://api.gatherdata.co/models/account/records \
  -d id="account_123"
  -d name="Lovelace, Inc"
  -d country="England"

{
    "id": "account_123",
    "name": "Lovelace, Inc",
    "country": "England",
}

customers.title: Powering success for thousands of customers

testimonials.testimonial: Gather has enabled us to exceed our customers’ expectations. We’ve achieved best-in-breed CSAT and retention numbers, which has helped us to develop customer champions and propel our organic growth.
testimonials.name: Karim Butt

footerCta.title: Let's get started
footerCta.subtitle: 14 day free trial. No credit card required.

features.title: Customer Success Stack
features.subtitle: Understand the customer journey with Gather’s unified customer view, leverage signaling to predict customer churn, get notified when warning signals are present and create intervention workflows before customers churn.

featureDataEngine.title: Unified Data Layer
featureDataEngine.copy: A unified customer view with native integrations for all of your existing tools - customer and sales data from HubSpot, payment data and plans from Stripe, support tickets from Zendesk, to name a few. Gather unifies the data and builds an integrated timeline for you so you can piece together the full customer story.

featureIQ.title: Signals and Alerts
featureIQ.copy: Predict churn with higher level metrics like customer health scores. Get notifications in Slack when customer behavior signals dip into the warning zone. Never miss another opportunity to intervene when things go wrong.

benefits.title: Alerting based on trends (percentage change WoW)

featureOrchestrate.title: Operations
featureOrchestrate.copy: Build success processes to help you scale - intervention workflows when negative signals are triggered, maintenance workflows for regularly scheduled check-ins and relationship workflows to set up different touchpoints within your organization. Increase productivity and operationalize your success.

subtitle: Identify customers who are at the greatest risk of churning, perform interventions and build automated workflows to help your success team perform at scale.
title: Operationalize your success
